name: Shifty Shapes (Gameheads)
description:
Shifty Shapes aim to convey the stage of stubborn immaturity and the struggle to find it in oneself to change and improve. The puzzle are meant to convey the difficult process of improving yourself by transforming into something else to progress in the game 

A platformer that use puzzle element through the use of shapes and colors. Each shape and color has special abilities that could be lost or gained through the level.
